name: Coeur Mining, Inc.
description: Coeur Mining, Inc. is a leading precious metals mining company engaged in the mining, exploration, and development of gold and silver properties in North America. Founded in 1928, Coeur has established itself as a strong player in the mining industry, focusing on sustainable practices and responsible resource management. The company operates several mines, including the Palmarejo mine in Mexico, the Rochester mine in Nevada, and the Kensington mine in Alaska, each contributing to Coeur's robust production capabilities. Coeur Mining is committed to sustainable mining practices, ensuring the protection of the environment and the communities in which it operates. The company invests in technology and innovation to enhance its operational efficiency and reduce its environmental footprint. Coeur's strategic vision includes not only maintaining its current operations but also pursuing growth opportunities through exploration and potential acquisitions. With a focus on advancing its resource base, Coeur aims to increase its production and improve its cost structure, ensuring long-term profitability and shareholder value. The company is publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) under the ticker symbol CDE and remains dedicated to transparency and accountability in its operations.
